name: Too long to escape
description:
ESCAPE!

Go down fast because the holes between the wooden bars will get smaller unless you go through them.

GET POINTS

Earn points from playing to get new habilities.

EASY CONTROLS

Move the player with the left and right key, jump with the space or run by pressing shift. You can also pause the game with escape.

GAME JAM

Made in two weeks for "Tu juego a juicio" jam; the theme was "too long". The teme is applied because if you don't make the hole between the barriers bigger you will be too long to pass through and escape. This is my first game jam!
